TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageBox extends System.Object

summary.span: 顯示訊息視窗 (亦稱為對話方塊)，以顯示訊息給使用者。

span.span: Displays a message window, also known as a dialog box, which presents a message to the user.

summary.span: 它是強制回應視窗，除非使用者將關閉，否則將無法在應用程式中執行其他動作。

span.span: It is a modal window, blocking other actions in the application until the user closes it.

summary.span: 可以包含文字、按鈕和通知與指示使用者的符號。

span.span: A can contain text, buttons, and symbols that inform and instruct the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立的新執行個體類別。You cannot create a new instance of the class. 若要顯示訊息方塊，請呼叫`static`方法。To display a message box, call the `static` method . 標題、 訊息、 按鈕和圖示顯示在訊息方塊是您傳遞給此方法的參數所決定。The title, message, buttons, and icons displayed in the message box are determined by parameters that you pass to this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用通知中遺漏項目的使用者。The following code example shows how to use a to inform the user of a missing entry in a . 這個範例需要呼叫方法時，會從現有的表單名為**ServerName**在其上。This example requires that the method is called from an existing form with a named **ServerName** on it. [!code-cpp[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何詢問使用者是或否問題並做出決策，根據的回應。The following code example shows how to ask the user a yes or no question and make a decision based on the response. [!code-cpp[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`owner`參數來指定特定的物件，它會實作介面，將做為對話方塊的最上層視窗和擁有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 根據預設，訊息方塊會顯示**確定** 按鈕。By default, the message box displays an **OK** button. 訊息方塊不包含標題中的標題。The message box does not contain a caption in the title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`owner`參數來指定特定的物件，它會實作介面，將做為對話方塊的最上層視窗和擁有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 您可以有最多三個按鈕的訊息方塊上。You can have a maximum of three buttons on the message box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示的這個多載所支援的選項與。The following code example demonstrates how to display a with the options supported by this overload of . 之後確認字串變數`ServerName`，是空的此範例會顯示，提供使用者取消作業的選項。After verifying that a string variable, `ServerName`, is empty, the example displays a , offering the user the option to cancel the operation. 如果方法的傳回值會評估為，顯示的表單已關閉。If the method's return value evaluates to , the form that displayed the is closed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕時，在指定的說明檔`helpFilePath`開啟參數。When the user clicks Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened. 擁有訊息方塊 （或作用中的表單） 的表單也會收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. `helpFilePath`參數可以是表單 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm 的格式。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示含有 [說明] 按鈕的訊息方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕，`Mspaint.chm`開啟說明檔案。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened. 這個範例需要`Mspaint.chm`安裝說明檔。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`owner`參數來指定特定的物件，它會實作介面，將做為對話方塊的最上層視窗和擁有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 您可以有最多三個按鈕的訊息方塊上。You can have a maximum of three buttons on the message box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示的這個多載所支援的選項與。The following code example demonstrates how to display a with the options supported by this overload of . 之後確認字串變數`ServerName`，是空的此範例會顯示，提供使用者取消作業的選項。After verifying that a string variable, `ServerName`, is empty, the example displays a , offering the user the option to cancel the operation. 如果方法的傳回值會評估為，顯示的表單已關閉。If the method's return value evaluates to , the form that displayed the is closed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕時，在指定的說明檔`helpFilePath`參數會開啟，而且所識別的說明關鍵字的主題`keyword`參數會顯示。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help keyword topic identified by the `keyword` parameter is displayed. 擁有訊息方塊 （或作用中的表單） 的表單也會收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示含有 [說明] 按鈕的訊息方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕`Mspaint.chm`開啟說明檔案，並以識別主題`mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm`關鍵字會顯示。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the topic identified by the `mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm` keyword is displayed. 這個範例需要`Mspaint.chm`安裝說明檔。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕時，在指定的說明檔`helpFilePath`參數會開啟，而且所識別的說明內容`navigator`參數會顯示。When the user clicks the Help button, the help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help content identified by the `navigator` parameter is displayed. 擁有訊息方塊 （或作用中的表單） 的表單也會收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. 編譯的說明檔提供的內容、 索引、 搜尋和網頁中的關鍵字連結的資料表。Compiled Help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 您可以使用下列值`navigator`: ， ， ，或。You can use the following values for `navigator`: , , , or . `helpFilePath`參數可以是表單 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm 的格式。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示含有 [說明] 按鈕的訊息方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 當使用者按一下 說明 按鈕，`Mspaint.chm`開啟說明檔案，並說明索引 索引標籤會顯示。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the Help index tab is displayed. 這個範例需要`Mspaint.chm`安裝說明檔。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 您可以使用`owner`參數來指定特定的物件，它會實作介面，將做為對話方塊的最上層視窗和擁有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕時，在指定的說明檔`helpFilePath`開啟參數。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened. 擁有訊息方塊 （或作用中的表單） 的表單也會收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. `helpFilePath`參數可以是表單 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm 的格式。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示訊息方塊，其主要表單父代。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box that parented to the main form. 訊息方塊會顯示 [說明] 按鈕。The message box displays a Help button. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕，`Mspaint.chm`開啟說明檔案。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened. 這個範例需要`Mspaint.chm`安裝說明檔。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. span.span: Displays a message box with the specified text, caption, buttons, icon, default button, options, and Help button, using the specified Help file and Help keyword.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息方塊是強制回應對話方塊中，這表示任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 至強制回應表單上的物件時，可能除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 您可以使用`owner`參數來指定特定的物件，它會實作介面，將做為對話方塊的最上層的擁有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level owner. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕時，在指定的說明檔`helpFilePath`參數會開啟，而且所識別的說明關鍵字的主題`keyword`參數會顯示。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help keyword topic identified by the `keyword` parameter is displayed. 擁有訊息方塊 （或作用中的表單） 的表單也會收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示訊息方塊到主視窗的父代。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box parented to the main window. 訊息方塊會顯示 [說明] 按鈕。The message box displays a Help button. 當使用者按一下 [說明] 按鈕`Mspaint.chm`開啟說明檔案，並以識別主題`mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm`關鍵字會顯示。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the topic identified by the `mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm` keyword is displayed. 這個範例需要`Mspaint.chm`安裝說明檔。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed.
